title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing 'Finish' in the JAR packager, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When attempting to create a JAR using the packager, the process fails and displays an error message.
EB: The JAR packager should be able to successfully create the JAR without any error messages.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a file and make some changes without saving. 2. Open the JAR packager for the corresponding project. 3. Enter all the required information such as path, destination, and name of the JAR. 4. Click 'Finish' to create the JAR.
